description:
If you need an experienced criminal defense attorney in Ellicott City, Maryland, do not hesitate to contact Azari Law, LLC to schedule a consultation. When you need an experienced litigator and an aggressive criminal defender on your side, contact our firm today.

If you have been charged with a crime, you need to act quickly to ensure that your rights are defended. Depending on the nature of your offense, it is likely that law enforcement and the prosecutor's office has been building a case against you for some time. You need the same dedication and tenacity working for you. Whether your charge involves DUI, drug crimes, traffic violations, assault or theft crimes, Azari Law, LLC can fight to protect your freedom.

Established in 2010, Azari Law LLC has quickly become a trusted legal resource in Laurel and throughout Maryland. Firm founder, Omid Azari has earned a place in the 2013 The National Trial Lawyers' Top 100 Trial Lawyers and the 2013 Top 40 Under 40 Trial Lawyers. When experience matters, contact Azari Law LLC.

If you are looking for excellent service and a people-friendly approach, then you have come to the right place. At Azari Law, LLC, our ultimate goal is to serve you and make your experience a pleasant one. Our team will stop at nothing to ensure that you come away more than satisfied. We offer free consultations and are accessible 24/7. We are proud to offer services in Spanish, Persian and Farsi. We maintain a Rockville location by appointment only.
